title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: When creating a new project, the bin directory should be checked to ensure it can be scrubbed.
EB: Currently there is no confirmation or check to see if the bin directory can be scrubbed during project creation.
SR: Implement a check during project creation to verify if the bin directory can be scrubbed and display an appropriate confirmation message if it cannot.
